summary: Unenchanted replicas from Animated Enchantment Effects
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][COLOR=#b2a2c7][SIZE=5][FONT=Impact][B]Reuploaded by request. This mod adds unenchanted version of the [/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#b2a2c7][SIZE=5][FONT=Impact][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#b2a2c7][SIZE=5][FONT=Impact][B]weapons from Animated Enchantment Effects. The weapons can be [/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#b2a2c7][SIZE=5][FONT=Impact][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#b2a2c7][SIZE=5][FONT=Impact][B]crafted at any forge, with no perk requirements. [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14192]Original Mod[/URL] is not required. [/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][B][COLOR=#b2a2c7][SIZE=5][FONT=Impact][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [/CENTER]
